name: Cryptocurrency – Coins List, Price List, Ticker & ICOs
author: Inqsys Technology

sections.description:
Cryptocurrency – Coins List, Price List, Ticker & ICOs helps to create a website with all the cryptcurrency market data. You can create a crypto coins list, price list, tickers and even can display initial coin offering aka ICOs. It helps in displaying coin market price for Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Litecoin, Tether etc.

Features

  • Display simple table with cryptocurrency coins with price, 24 hours changes and a trading link.
  • Advance table of cryptocurrency coins with advance data like marketcap, volume, supply etc.
  • Probably the only free plugin available in wordpress.org with price chart of seven days
  • Ticker with three different positions, header, footer and anywhere
  • A shortcode generator button in classic editor to add shortcode with simple clicks.
  • Create simple table for ICOs according to their status: Ongoing, Past, Upcoming
  • And more upcoming features.
sections.installation:
By downloading it from wordpress.org

  1. Download the cryptocurrency-coins-list-price-list-ticker-icos.zip file and unzip it.
  2. Upload the cryptocurrency-coins-list-price-list-ticker-icos folder to the wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  3. Activate the cryptocurrency – Coins List, Price List, Ticker & ICOs from plugin page on wordpress admin area.

Alternatively, you can install the plugin automatically through the WordPress Admin Panel

  1. Open your WordPress website admin panel and go to Plugins > Add New
  2. Search by ‘Author’ for ‘inqsys‘
  3. Look for the plugin: Cryptocurrency – Coins List, Price List, Ticker & ICOs
  4. Click on Install Now button and then click on Activate Plugin link

Support

If you find this useful, please consider donating and this would help us in the development of the plugin and improve support.
sections.faq:
Do you support live price changes?

The current version of this plugin does not support live price changes.

Is this data accurate for crypto trading?

We are doing our best efforts to make all the market data as accurate as possible. However, we are consuming a 3rd party API and we do not promise or holds any responsibility for the accurance of the data.

Is there any way to show the crypto price in other currency like INR, EURO, Yen etc?

We are glad that you asked. You can choose from 51 currency to display the cryptocurrency price.

Is there any downtime?

The plugin itself does not have any downtime issues but all the cryptocurrency coin market data is provided via a 3rd party API coingecko.com. We don’t provide any support regarding any technical issue nor we holds and gurantee/responsibility for its uptime/downtime.

Is there any design options for the widgets?

Yes, ofcourse. There are design options in the admin settings area. You can chose the background color or font color with some simple clicks. For an advance user, we have integrated a CSS editor to add a custom CSS.

short_description: A single plugin to create a cryptocurrency website with all the crypto data.
